Class TransmissionWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • moe.zenbu.torrent.wrappers.TransmissionWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientWrapper

    public class TransmissionWrapper
extends Object
implements ClientWrapper

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransmissionWrapper(String username, String password)
      Constructs a client wrapper for Deluge, uses default values for the url and port.
      TransmissionWrapper(String username, String password, String url, int port)
      Constructs a client wrapper for Transmission, uses specified url and port.

        Parameters:

        url - URL for the Transmission web ui
        port - Port for the Transmission web ui

      • removeTorrent

        public void removeTorrent(Torrent torrent,
                          boolean withData)
                   throws WrapperConnectException,
                          WrapperUnauthorisedException

        Specified by:
        removeTorrent in interface ClientWrapper
        Parameters:

        withData - Remove downloaded data as well

        WrapperConnectException
